name: Plastic Acoustic Panels
description: Acoustic panels made from plastic materials, designed to absorb sound waves and reduce noise levels in rooms and spaces.

name: Plastic Soundproof Curtains
description: Curtains made from sound-absorbing plastic material, designed to block external noise and improve acoustics in rooms.

name: Plastic Soundproof Foam
description: Foam panels made from plastic material, designed to dampen and absorb sound waves for soundproofing walls, ceilings, and floors.

name: Plastic Soundproof Insulation
description: Insulation materials made from plastic fibers or foam, designed to block and absorb sound for soundproofing buildings and structures.

name: Plastic Soundproof Sealant
description: Sealant made from plastic material, designed to fill gaps and cracks in walls, windows, and doors to prevent sound transmission.

name: Plastic Soundproof Tiles
description: Tiles made from plastic material, designed to block and absorb sound waves for soundproofing walls, ceilings, and floors in residential and commercial spaces.

name: Plastic Soundproof Underlay
description: Underlayment made from plastic material, designed to reduce impact noise and airborne sound transmission in flooring systems.

name: Plastic Soundproof Windows
description: Windows with soundproofing features, made from plastic frames and double or triple glazing, designed to minimize noise intrusion from outside.

name: Plastic Soundproof Doors
description: Doors made from plastic material, equipped with soundproofing seals and insulation, designed to block and absorb sound for noise reduction.

name: Plastic Soundproof Partitions
description: Partition walls made from plastic material, designed to divide spaces and provide sound insulation for privacy and noise control.
